Detailed Description

corba.h,v 1.150 2002/07/01 14:03:46 parsons Exp

Master Header file for the TAO CORBA ORB. Include only this file, to see all public ORB interfaces declared by TAO.

This follows the OMG C++ mapping for compilers that don't support C++ exceptions or namespaces.
